ARABIC: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the magicians came, they said to Pharaoh, 'Will we be rewarded if we are the winners?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the magicians arrived, they said to the Pharaoh: "Is there a reward for us if we are victorious?" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When the magicians came forth (for the encounter) they said to Pharaoh: "Is there a reward for us if we triumph?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the magicians came, they asked the Pharaoh, "Will there be any reward for us if we win?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the magicians came, they said to Firaun, “Will we get some reward if we are victorious?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, when the sorcerers arrived, they said to Fir`awn: "Will there surely be a reward for us if we are the winners"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the magicians came, they said to Firon: Shall we get a reward if we are the vanquishers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, when the sorcerers came, they said to Pharaoh, 'Shall we indeed have a wage, if we should be the victors?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the wizards came they said unto Pharaoh: Will there surely be a reward for us if we are the winners?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the magicians came, they asked Pharaoh, "Shall we have a reward, if we are the winners?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when the magicians came, they said unto Fir'awn: will there surely be a big hire for us if we are the winners?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when the magicians came, they said to Pharaoh, ‘Shall we have a reward if we were to be the victors?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So when the sorcerers arrived, they said to Pharaoh: "Of course - shall we have a (suitable) reward if we win?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So when the sorcerers arrived, they said to Fir'aun (Pharaoh): "Will there surely be a reward for us if we are the winners?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, when the sorcerers came to Pharaoh, they said: 'Shall we receive a wage if we win'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, “Is there a reward for us, if we are the winners?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:41] So when the sorcerers came, they said to Pharaoh, ‘Shall we indeed (read a-inna either by pronouncing both hamzas, or by not pronouncing the second, but in both cases inserting an alif) have a reward if we were to be the victors?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the wizards came they said unto Pharaoh: Will there surely be a reward for us if we are the winners) against Moses?
